name: Serenity
description: Your mind has started unraveling and you witness things that you had never imagined before; within the folds of a flower, the laugh of a child, the raindrops as they fall from the sky, all hold a deeper and spiritual meaning that no one else is capable of knowing, for they stand ignorant, their senses clouded by their ego and the race for blatant materialism. The light that shone in you has encompassed your existence, placing you in an aura of serenity and peace that soothes your existence. There exists no negative thoughts, for you have transcended petty human emotions and perils.
